summary: The "Jobs and Opportunity with Benefits and Services (JOBS) for Success Act of 2025" reauthorizes and reforms the Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF) program. Key provisions include: increasing workforce participation through individual opportunity plans, establishing performance accountability measures with employment exit goals, improving data reporting, targeting funds to truly needy families (income limits), requiring states to spend more on core activities, strengthening program integrity, and promoting poverty reduction. The bill also eliminates obsolete provisions and specifies an effective date.
